title: POGO Event Schema
description: Schema for validating Pokémon GO event data (flexible Category + optional normalized bucket).

Start Date.description: Event start date in YYYY-MM-DD format

End Date.description: Event end date in YYYY-MM-DD format (nullable)

Category Normalized.description: Stable bucket derived by the pipeline (optional).

Sources.description: List of raw sources contributing to this row

Region.description: Region or scope of the event (nullable)

Date Parse Status.description: Status of date parsing for this row

Date Inference Confidence.description: Confidence score for inferred date (stringified float or blank)

Date Inference Source.description: Source of inferred date, if any (e.g., pubDate, title regex, etc.)

Has Valid Dates.description: True if Start Date is valid, false otherwise
